tool_description: Calculate fastest driving, cycling, walking or multimodal public transportation route between locations
name: Route optimization
title: Route optimization

api_list.name: Route and directions
api_list.description: Calculate route between provided waypoints, including turn by turn directions

required_parameters.name: mode
required_parameters.description: Routing mode - drive, truck, bicycle, walk or transit

required_parameters.name: waypoints
required_parameters.description: List of two or more lat,lon coordinates, separated by the pipe symbol \"|\"
